doc.name: networkInterfaces
doc.summary: Reports a list of all the network interfaces available on the current system.

example.p: if "192.168.0.1" is among the lines of the networkInterfaces then

description.overview: Use the networkInterfaces property to find out the IPv4 addresses of the available network interfaces on the current system.
description.value: The networkInterfaces is a return-delimited list of IPv4 addresses (one per line).
description.comments: This property is read-only and cannot be set.
